content: look at photos before starting i m not a pattern writer so sorry if its not clear and its free its just crossing the stitches at mid-way point & then knitting then together after you knitted them both separately for amount stated much easier to knit with double point needles so when you twist you can see what your doing knits up very fast you can use different yarns the bulky yarn is what gives it the richness if you want it for a child cast on 10 sts for a thinner yarn cast on 18 22 26 etc you can also do a longer twist by doing the main part less inches and the twist longer i also like to tack the twisted part down fun to use more then one color also mix two yarns for a more textured feel did a provisional cast-on and kitchener stitch and didn t see any difference then just sewing together just found out you need to do do a different kind of grafting with a rib try a 3 needle bind-off might work better wonderful to keep head & ears warm video of how to knit this pattern thank you christine for a great video http //iknitspatterns blogspot com/2014/01/twistin-turban html when you place the 1st 6 stitches on a holder you need to use the 6th stitch to cast off the 2 purl sts
